video.title: The Mr. Peabody and Sherman Show
video.synopsis: In their new show, Mr. Peabody and Sherman host a zany late-night comedy show from a swanky penthouse, with time-traveling guests and a live audience!

episodes.synopsis: Peabody and Sherman's first show goes off the rails when their celebrity-crazed neighbors won't leave. Napoleon throws a temper tantrum over dessert.
episodes.title: The Perfect Show / Napoleon

episodes.synopsis: Peabody tries to play an Irish jig while trapped in the elevator. Mozart blows his big piano audition and lands everyone in jail.
episodes.title: Stuck / Mozart

episodes.synopsis: Sherman begs Peabody to keep a woolly mammoth as his pet. Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges and discovers spaghetti.
episodes.title: Sherman's Pet / Marco Polo

episodes.synopsis: Christine won't release Peabody from handcuffs until he lets her sing. The Wright brothers must get their plane back from a flock of angry birds.
episodes.title: Handcuffs for a Song / Wright Bros

episodes.synopsis: Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show. Beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.
episodes.title: New Sponsor / Cleopatra

episodes.synopsis: Peabody and Sherman accidentally create a black hole after skipping their chores. Winston Churchill hides in a baby nursery to avoid work.
episodes.title: Black Hole / Winston Churchill

episodes.synopsis: Sherman brings back a giant man-baby after he loses a neighbor's son in the WABAC. Blackbeard battles a bully pirate to get his mojo and beard back.
episodes.title: Big Boy / Blackbeard

episodes.synopsis: Shelby, Peabody and Sherman's biggest fan, accidentally gets sucked into the show. Queen Isabella falls for a scam and loses all her money.
episodes.title: Biggest Fan / Queen Isabella

episodes.synopsis: Peabody's non-talking dog parents arrive for an unexpected visit. Galileo makes the world go dark when he crashes his spaceship and breaks the sun.
episodes.title: Peabody's Parents / Galileo

episodes.synopsis: Sherman's scout troop, the Laser Robot Tiger Troopers, earn their merit badges on the show. Mark Twain's gift for gab wins back his lucky typewriter.
episodes.title: Patch Games / Mark Twain

episodes.synopsis: Christine tries to impress her twin sister by pretending to host the show and marry Peabody. Lady Godiva hides in a cake and joins a drum circle.
episodes.title: Favor for Christine / Lady Godiva

episodes.synopsis: Sherman lets Mr. Hobson ride Captain Cools to beat Joan of Arc in a jousting competition. John Sutter creates a pig rush to discover the gold rush.
episodes.title: Medieval Fest / John Sutter

episodes.synopsis: Sherman accidentally finds the cure for a prehistoric bird flu that's turning everyone blue. Zeus's Titans face off against a gawky geek squad.
episodes.title: Outbreak / Ancient Greek Games

episodes.synopsis: A malfunctioning machine strands Peabody, Sherman and their whole audience on the moon. Catherine the Great invents the world's first roller coaster.
episodes.title: Show on the Road / Catherine the Great

episodes.synopsis: Sherman and Boogaz pair up as egg parents for a school project. Engineer George Stephenson needs Peabody and Sherman's help stopping a runaway train.
episodes.title: Scrambled Eggs / George Stephenson

episodes.synopsis: Ringmaster Peabody and temporarily tattooed Sherman host a circus-themed show. Sweet Tune, Sherman and Peabody pursue a band of thieving monkeys.
episodes.title: Big Top Peabody / Taj Mahal

episodes.synopsis: Sherman is determined to set a world record. When Easter Island's famous statues come to life, it's clear that King Hotu Matu'a has something to hide.
episodes.title: World Records / Hotu Matu'a

episodes.synopsis: Sleepy Sherman struggles to stay awake during the show. Superstitious sumo wrestler Akashi Shiganosuke decides to become a Kabuki dancer instead.
episodes.title: Sherman From A to Zzzz / Akashi Shiganosuke

episodes.synopsis: Orchoptitron is depressed because his girlfriend dumped him. John Harrington makes the 1500s smell a lot better when he invents the toilet.
episodes.title: Orchoptitron in Love / John Harrington

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Hobson accidentally eats a shrunken Sherman. Teenage Annie Oakley shows off her sharpshooting skills in the Old West.
episodes.title: Inside Hobson / Annie Oakley

episodes.synopsis: Pudgy Peabody can't stop eating. Spanish conquistador Ponce de Leon is looking for the Fountain of Youth, but he has a very short attention span.
episodes.title: Peabody's Diet / Ponce de Leon

episodes.synopsis: A sophisticated spy shares his cool secret agent gadgets with Peabody. Alexander Cartwright invents baseball, but he keeps changing the rules!
episodes.title: Secret Agent Sherman / Alexander Cartwright

episodes.synopsis: Sherman swaps places with an 11-year-old emperor from ancient China. Angry ghosts keep Charles Dickens from finishing his novel "A Christmas Carol."
episodes.title: Sherman Exchange Program / Charles Dickens

episodes.synopsis: Archaeologist Sherman digs up a secret from Peabody's past. Sherman and Peabody can't stop snacking on George Crum's tasty invention: the potato chip!
episodes.title: Ruff Guyz / George Crum

episodes.synopsis: Nostradamus delivers a cryptic riddle on Family Fun Night. In 1805, Sacagawea helps Peabody and Sherman track down explorers Lewis and Clark.
episodes.title: I Knew That Was Gonna Happen / Sacagawea

episodes.synopsis: Cleopatra, Mark Twain and other disgruntled guests stage a protest during the show's finale. Aristophanes's jokes flop when his comic muse flees.
episodes.title: The Perfect Show Again / Aristophanes
